the.railsi.st

About

the.railsi.st is Patrick Crowley.

I'm a Ruby developer and this blog is a record of my experiences using Ruby on Rails to build web apps.

I also run SD Ruby, a local Ruby group in San Diego known for its podcast.

Plugins

  • Javascripter - Organize your .js
  • Headliner - DRY up page titles
  • Styler - Stylesheets made easy

Podcasts

I've given several talks about Ruby.

  • Paperclip
  • Haml & Sass
  • Headliner & Styler
  • Rails for Legacy apps
  • ActsNaked
  • ActsAsTaggable
  • Summer of Rails

Recent work

  • SD Ruby

  • Measured Voice
  • Summer of Rails
  • Chumby

Headliner bug fix

Thanks to Jason Perry and Richard Crowley for catching a bug in the last Headliner update.

I'm hoping to put together tests for Headliner (and Styler) soon, so releases can be more reliable in the future, especially for people who are using svn externals.

Anyways, the bug is fixed, so I highly recommend updating now.

July 16, 2007
